EmailTemplate.name: 17.CloudAA.XLE.webXLE.N.G.N.9898.XLE Gamechanger (Refresh).Email 8 - Understandi
EmailTemplate.subject: Understanding the enterprise cloud and how it’s changing the game
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Understanding OpenStack and the enterprise cloud Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Exploring new technologies and strategies can be daunting – or it can be invigorating. The question is, where to begin?
Let me suggest, “Getting to the Heart of the Enterprise Cloud”, presented by industry expert, Tom Nolle.
In it Tom shares insights about why enterprises need to move to an OpenStack enterprise cloud, and how it’s changing the game. This is a must-see webinar. To learn more about Nokia IT solutions for large enterprises, visit our OpenStack <[[https://networks.nokia.com/solutions/openstack]]> page.
Sincerely,
Michael Williams | Global Enterprise Marketing | Nokia
U.S. and Canada: +1 866-231-0264 (M-F 8:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. EST)Europe & Asia Pacific: + 44 203 582 5650 (M-F 8:00a.m.- 4:00p.m. GMT)Or use the How to Buy form <[[https://networks.nokia.com/how-to-buy]]> Connect with us © 2017 Nokia.
